title: Bought pixel 4a email notifications wont work and no light?
content:
Brand new pixel 4a, new phone and I cannot get Gmail notifications.  I've tried everything.  Its is the most frustrating thing in the world a simple notification!

I've basically given up read lots of similar issues about the phone and basically want to send it back straight away. The lack of notification light really annoyed me. I thought that was basic!

Feel like I've wasted time getting this phone

Can anyone help?
